about_the_game:
In the Town, click on the right border to move the map.
You can select multiple characters by dragging them.


In the medieval magic fantasy world, the protagonist is a man who captures deserters from the kingdom and sells them back to the kingdom after punishing them behind closed doors.
One day, he hears the story of a deserter he is about to execute and begins to have doubts, and eventually stops selling.

- Move your hero with a point click.
- Equip or collect items picked up from the floor.
- Capture enemy heroes to execute or join them.
- Build buildings in your town to discover or upgrade abilities.
- Explore the map's terrain and invade enemy villages to expand your power.
- Conversely, defeat or recruit enemies who are advancing on you.
- Each hero has a level, special skills, and items with special abilities.
- Items drop when enemies are defeated.
- You can trade items with everyone online, join alliances, and compete between factions.

content_descriptors.notes:
Like typical RPGs and RTSs, you collect and grow your character, killing enemies along the way.
There are no graphic sex scenes.
